solution.text:
The formula for sum is \(S_n=\frac n2[2a+(n-1)d]\)
If n is the last term of AP, \(a_n=a_1+(n-1)d=l\)(say)
The \(S_n\)can be re-written as \(S_n=\frac n2[a+l]\)
first even term is _{{j+1}}_ and last even term is _{{k-1}}_
total no. of even terms(n) = \((_{{k-1}}_-_{{j+1}}_)\over2\) + 1
\(n=_{{(Decimal('0.5')*(k-j-2))+1}}_\)
therefore, \(S_n=\frac n2[_{{j+1}}_+_{{k-1}}_]\)
\(S_n=_{{Decimal('0.5')*((Decimal('0.5')*(k-j-2))+1)*(j+k)}}_\)

content.text: Find the sum of all the even numbers between _{j}_ and _{k}_?
